column4: hey guys,,, from a fairly default setup, no X, just terminal,, how do i add ~/bin/ to $PATH for all users? including root?
i'm looking into ~/.bashrc for each user, or into /etc/bash.bashrc ,, and i'm not sure how to right the line in to do it
This line works for me. Maybe it will help you. export PATH=$PATH:$HOME/base/mine/bin
